Dormant {2}{U} [i](You may cast this spell for its dormant cost. If you do, it isn't a creature.)[/i]
When Mountainwide Colossus enters, draw two cards, then discard a card.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, if Mountainwide Colossus isn't a creature, put a startup counter on it. Then if it has five or more startup counters on it, exile it, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
